  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CohuPTZPoller
    Poller for the Cohu PTZ protocol.
    CohuPTZProp
    Cohu PTZ Property
    DeviceReqProp
    Cohu device request property.
    OpDeviceReq
    Operation to send a Cohu device request.
    OpPTZCamera
    Cohu PTZ operation to pan/tilt/zoom a camera.
    OpRecallPreset
    Cohu PTZ operation to recall a camera preset.
    OpStorePreset
    Cohu PTZ operation to store a camera preset.
    PanProp
    A property to pan a camera
    PanTiltZoomProp
    A combined property to pan and/or tilt a Helios camera.
    RecallPresetProp
    This class creates a Cohu PTZ request to instruct the camera to recall a preset state.
    StorePresetProp
    This class creates a Cohu PTZ request to instruct a camera to store the current state to a specified preset.
    TiltProp
    A property to tilt a camera
    ZoomProp
    A property to zoom a camera
